source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_00<tab>Narujj Boh has a unique proposal for depriving the Flamefangs of easy targets.
target: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のナルジ・ボーは、厄介事に対して一計を案じているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_01<tab>Narujj Boh wishes to convince the U tribe rangers to quit the sands before their divided forces fall prey to Flamefang raiders. Speak with the drake whisperer in the Sagolii Desert to borrow a flame-spitting mount with which to cow the stubborn hunters.
target: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_01<tab>ナルジ・ボーの依頼を受けた。サゴリー砂漠の「灰の獣牧士」に話しかけ、キャバルリー・ドレイクに騎乗しよう。

source:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_02You have spoken with the drake whisperer and mounted a mighty cavalry drake. Ride it into the Sagolii Desert, and use its Fiery Breath to convince the U tribe rangers to flee the sands.

※Speak with the drake whisperer in the Sagolii Desert to mount a cavalry drake.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_02キャバルリー・ドレイクに騎乗した状態で、サゴリー砂漠にある3箇所の「」にキャバルリー・ドレイクの「炎の息」を使い、ミコッテ族を追い払おう。

※サゴリー砂漠の「灰の獣牧士」に話しかけると「キャバルリー・ドレイク」に騎乗できます。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_03<tab>The gouts of flame spat by your mount have had the desired effect on the hunters of Forgotten Springs. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_03<tab>炎の息を使ってミコッテ族を追い払った。灰の陣営の「ナルジ・ボー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_04<tab>Narujj Boh praises your efforts in saving the Miqo'te rangers from their own ill-considered tactics. Though unconvinced that his plan will have any lasting effect, the stoic soldier is nevertheless content to deprive the Flamefangs of further tempered slaves for as long as possible.
target: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_SEQ_04<tab>ナルジ・ボーに報告した。冒険者の活躍によって、ミコッテ族たちは逃げ散ったようだ。無駄な血が流れずに済んだことに、ナルジ・ボーも安心していた。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the drake whisperer and mount the cavalry drake.
target: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_TODO_00<tab>サゴリー砂漠の灰の獣牧士と話し、キャバルリー・ドレイクに騎乗

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_TODO_01<tab>Ride the cavalry drake into the Sagolii Desert and use its Fiery Breath at the designated locations.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_TODO_01キャバルリー・ドレイクに騎乗してサゴリー砂漠のに
炎の息を使う

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>The Miqo'te of Forgotten Springs have grown desperate in their ongoing conflict with the Flamefangs. They have spread their forces too thin in an effort to protect their hunting grounds.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_000忘れられたオアシスのミコッテ族たちと、
ザハラク戦陣の連中との対立は、
日に日に深まっている。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>The U tribe will not accept aid from us, but we cannot allow their ill-considered tactics to result in ever more tempered slaves.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_002我らにミコッテ族を助ける義理なし。
されどこの一件、放置もできぬのもまた事実。
敗れたミコッテ族が「焼かれし者」になっては厄介なり。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_003<tab>I have devised a solution to this quandary: as there are various problems that would arise from a direct confrontation, I propose that we employ the unbearable heat of a drake's breath to drive the rangers back to their settlement.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_003そこで我は一計を案じた。
直接ミコッテ族と刃を交えるは、問題がある。
ゆえにドレイクを使い、軽い火傷程度で警告するが上策。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_004<tab>Such a measure will not cow the seasoned hunters for long, but it will at least prevent the Flamefangs from swelling their ranks until we have had chance to enact further plans.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_004サゴリー砂漠にいるミコッテ族を、
「炎牙衆」の標的となる前に追い払うのだ。
少し脅せば四分五裂、オアシスへと逃げ帰るはず。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_005<tab>Speak with our master of drakes at the edge of the Sagolii, and heed his instructions well.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_005灰の獣牧士に支度を頼んだ。
あの者に話しかけて、早速役目を果たされよ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MOUNTAMALJAA_000_010<tab>You are ready to ride forth, honored ally? My drake is at your service. Rattle the nerves of these foolish Miqo'te before they are snatched up by the next raiding party that happens along.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MOUNTAMALJAA_000_010我がキャバルリー・ドレイクの出番か。
幾人かのミコッテ族の狩人が、サゴリー砂漠にいる様子。
すみやかに奴らを脅し、彼の地より排除されよ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_020<tab>Ride forth on the mount supplied to you by the master of drakes, and seek out the Miqo'te rangers. A gout of flame at their feet should be enough to send them scrambling for home. Better to suffer a little singed fur than endure the madness of tempering.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_020キャバルリー・ドレイクに騎乗し、炎の息を以て、
サゴリー砂漠のミコッテ族どもを追い払え。
きゃつらの間近にあるに炎を吹きかけるのだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MOUNTAMALJAA_000_021<tab>Should you need to dismount, the drake will return here to me. I will hold her in readiness until you are prepared to continue your mission. Now go, and deprive the Flamefangs of their prey.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MOUNTAMALJAA_000_021キャバルリー・ドレイクより降り、
再び騎乗したきときは我を訪ねよ。
さぁ、存分に任務を遂行めされい。

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEA_000_030<tab>(-Straight-backed Ranger-)Ow, ow, ow! Gods-be-damned drake! I'll put an arrow down your throat...next time!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEA_000_030(-勝ち気そうな狩人-)あ、あちちちちっ！
なな、何をするっ！
アマルジャ族の手先めっ、おぼえてろー！

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEB_000_040<tab>(-Sweet-smelling Ranger-)Yeowch! My tail! You singed my beautiful tail!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEB_000_040(-甘い香りの狩人-)いやーん、なにすんのよっ！
シッポがちょっとコゲちゃったじゃないっ！
せっかく毛繕いしたのにーっ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEC_000_050<tab>(-Sharp-sighted Ranger-)Ugh, the heat sears my eyes! Get away from us! Away!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEC_000_050(-目つきの鋭い狩人-)うぬっ、おのれ、トカゲ野郎の差し金かっ！
今は大人しく引き下がってやるが……おぼえてろっ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTED_000_070<tab>(-Quick-witted Ranger-)Ack! Who the blazes are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!? The nunh will hear of this!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTED_000_070(-ウ族の狩人-)うひゃあっ！？　あ、危ないじゃないっ！
何のつもりよ、アマルジャ族の味方をする気っ！？

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEE_000_080<tab>(-Noble-featured Ranger-)Ugh, what's this? Are tempered slaves given drake mounts now!?
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEE_000_080(-凛々しい狩人-)くっ……アマルジャ族め、こんな者を差し向けるとは！
やむを得ん、ここは退かせてもらうっ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEF_000_090<tab>(-High-strung Ranger-)Ow, where did you come from!? The desert sands are hot enough without drake-fire!
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_MIQOTEF_000_090(-堂々とした狩人-)くっ、邪魔をするな！
ヒトのくせに、トカゲ野郎どものお先棒を担ぐのか！？
……仕方がない、今日は引き上げだ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_061<tab>The Miqo'te have retreated from the sands? That is well. Spilling blood without cause will not further our agenda. I thank you, honored ally.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA205_01236_NARUJIBOH_000_061ミコッテ族を追い払えたようだな……苦労、重畳なり。
このまま奴らが大人しくしておれば、
無駄な血を流さずにすむだろう。
